dialogStrings: Nibelheim Inn

“The, uh…
The whole inn's booked up
by Shinra for the night.”
“…?”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“Is it you, {Cloud}?”

“It must've been two years.”{PAUSE}“Say, you've really moved up in the world,
being under Sephiroth's command.”

“Wow…”{PAUSE}“This is really, somethin'.”{PAUSE}“You used to be such a scrawny
kid, and now look at you!”

“So, what do you need, {Cloud}?”
{CHOICE}Where's Sephiroth?

“He's upstairs.”

“It's all reserved for you

staying at home?”

“Now about the town…”{PAUSE}“A lot of monsters have been appearing

“I'll let you in on a secret…”{PAUSE}“The Shinra aren't really popular here.”{PAUSE}“You know what I mean, right?”{PAUSE}“You're from here, so you know.”

“It's the same story I always tell.
